header.title: Influenzanet
header.metaDescription: A participatory survey system for fighting epidemics

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

loginPage.title: Sign In
loginPage.signupLink: Don't have an account? Sign Up.

signupPage.title: Sign Up
signupPage.message: Register now to support the global fight against the novel coronavirus and influenza-like-illnesses!
signupPage.emailHint: Your email address will serve as the username for your account.
signupPage.passwordHint: For security reasons, your password should be at least 6 characters long and contain at least one number and one letter.
signupPage.newsletterHint: If you want to, we will remind you via E-Mail when new surveys are available in your subscribed studies. We will also send you updates about the project every few weeks.
signupPage.acceptPrivacyPolicyLabelBeforeLink: I have read and accept the
signupPage.receiveNewsletterLabel: I want to receive the newsletter and survey reminders.
signupPage.loginLink: Already have an account? Sign in.

passwordResetPage.headline: Change Password
passwordResetPage.invalidTokenMessage: Couldn't verify password reset link. Please try again.

errors.unknownError: Server Error. Please try again later:

activationPage.headline: You are signed up!
activationPage.description: Please activate your account by clicking the link we sent to your email address.
activationPage.changeEmailLink: Wrong email adress? Change it here.

verificationPage.failureSubtitle: Please try sending your activation email again.
verificationPage.failureSubtitleLoggedOut: Your account might already be activated. Please try logging in so we can check again.

profileCreateDialog.title: New Profile
profileCreateDialog.consentLabel: This person consents to the creation of this profile.
